name: Mediterranean Quinoa Bowl
description: Nutritious bowl with quinoa, roasted vegetables, and a lemon dressing. Perfect for a healthy lunch or dinner.
steps: Cook quinoa according to package directions
Dice tomato, cucumber, and red bell pepper
Thinly slice red onion
Whisk together lemon juice, olive oil, and minced garlic
Season with salt and pepper
Combine cooked quinoa with diced vegetables
Add arugula and toss with dressing
Top with sunflower seeds for crunch
Serve immediately

name: Grilled Salmon with Lemon and Asparagus
description: Fresh salmon fillet grilled to perfection with seasonal asparagus and bright lemon flavors.
steps: Preheat grill to medium-high heat
Trim asparagus spears and toss with olive oil
Season salmon with salt, pepper, and lemon juice
Grill salmon for 4-5 minutes per side
Grill asparagus for 3-4 minutes until tender-crisp
Mince garlic and mix with lemon zest
Top cooked salmon with garlic-lemon mixture
Serve salmon alongside grilled asparagus
Garnish with lemon wedges

name: Chicken and Vegetable Stir-Fry
description: Colorful stir-fry with tender chicken breast and crisp vegetables over brown rice.
steps: Cook brown rice according to package directions
Slice chicken breast into thin strips
Cut broccoli into florets and slice carrots
Dice red and green bell peppers
Heat oil in a large wok or skillet
Stir-fry chicken until cooked through, remove from pan
Add garlic and ginger, stir-fry for 30 seconds
Add vegetables and stir-fry until tender-crisp
Return chicken to pan and toss everything together
Serve over brown rice

name: Roasted Vegetable and Lentil Salad
description: Hearty salad with roasted root vegetables, protein-rich lentils, and fresh herbs.
steps: Preheat oven to 425Â°F
Dice sweet potato, carrot, and beetroot
Toss vegetables with olive oil, salt, and pepper
Roast for 25-30 minutes until tender
Cook green lentils until tender but firm
Slice red onion and dice cucumber
Whisk lemon juice with olive oil for dressing
Combine warm lentils with roasted vegetables
Add fresh spinach and cucumber
Toss with dressing and serve warm or at room temperature
